document_data.name: Torzhin Hulvesper
document_data.mainbody: '''Torzhin Hulvesper''' was a [[human]] [[cleric]] of [[Chauntea]] in the village of [[Maskyr's Eye]] in [[the Vast]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/55/The Everwinking Eye: A Closer Look at Maskyr's Eye|24}}
document_data.Relationships: He was the youngest son of [[Gundul Hulvesper]], a local [[horse]]-breeder.
document_data.Activities: In the late 1350s DR, he served as an acolyte at the [[House of Plenty (Maskyr's Eye)|House of Plenty]] temple under [[Lharathuel Hesmyr]]. He was available to provide healing to the farmers.
